title: New pre and post command plugin hooks
description:
The latest release of conda introduces two new plugin hooks: pre and post command. These hooks allow plugin
authors to execute code before and after any conda command. Learn more about how and why you would use
these in this post.

title: July 2023 Releases for conda and conda-build
description: Conda 23.7.0, 23.7.1, 23.7.2, and conda-build 3.26.0 have been released! 🎉

title: PackagingCon Call for Participation
description: PackagingCon 2023 will bring together different software packaging ecosystems to share best practices and discuss common challenges in software packaging. Abstract submission closes July 31 (!!!) and early registration ends September 8.

title: Conda and the libmamba solver: Roll-out plan 2023
description: Learn about the upcoming rollout plan for the conda-libmamba-solver, bringing enhanced performance and user experience to conda.

description: Community gathering spaces, upcoming events, the new rattler library, channel updates from conda-forge and Bioconda, a summary or recent conda-related web content, and releases and announcements.
